notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, V.D.Z., C.L.C. and I.S. (Ivanka Semerdjieva); methodology, C.L.C., A.S., I.D., V.M., T.A., and M.K.; resources, I.D., A.S., T.A., I.S. (Ivanka Semerdjieva), I. S. (Ivan Salamon), T.R., C.L.C., V.D.Z. and D.B.; writing—original draft preparation, I.S. and V.D.Z.; writing—review and editing, V.D.Z., C.L.C., I.S. (Ivanka Semerdjieva), T.R., A.S., V.M., M.K., T.A., D.B., I.D. and I.S. (Ivan Salamon); supervision, V.D.Z. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
